org.deeplearning4j.parallelism.factory

Interface TrainerContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTrainerContext, ParameterServerTrainerContext

    public interface TrainerContext
    Creates Trainer instances for use with ParallelWrapper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Trainer create(int threadId, Model model, int rootDevice, boolean useMDS, ParallelWrapper wrapper)
      Create a Trainer based on the given parameters
      void init(Model model, java.lang.Object... args)
      Initialize the context

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Model model,
          java.lang.Object... args)
        Initialize the context
        Parameters:
        model -
        args - the arguments to initialize with (maybe null)

      • create

        Trainer create(int threadId,
               Model model,
               int rootDevice,
               boolean useMDS,
               ParallelWrapper wrapper)
        Create a Trainer based on the given parameters
        Parameters:
        threadId - the thread id to use for this worker
        model - the model to start the trainer with
        rootDevice - the root device id
        useMDS - whether to use the MagicQueue or not
        wrapper - the wrapper instance to use with this trainer (this refernece is needed for coordination with the ParallelWrapper 's IterationListener
        Returns:
        the created training instance
